name: RGB Boy
description:
RGB Boy is an action-packed top-down shooter invoking nostalgic feelings with its pixelated graphics and retro audio design. It breaks up gameplay in between rounds by combining puzzle-based strategic factory building and RPG elements.

Colourful enemies explode and splatter upon impact, painting the floors of randomly generated dungeons. Pick and upgrade your arsenal to help you battle through an endless wave of enemies, while your factory manufactures ink cartridges that can be sold for profit.

Gain experience points and level up your RGB Boy, spending skill points on abilities that can aid you in combat as you progress.

Accessibility Options: colourblind modes can be enabled by pressing on 7, 8, 9 and 0 while in-game.
